channel.title: Cannonball!
channel.description: Me and my friends were in my friends (Nick) backyard, and we discovered something that looked like a rock. When we dug it up, it weighed a good 30-40 lbs. I picked it up and examined it, to find it was a cannonball. I think it's pretty cool. If i can later, i'll get a picture of it. A Civil war expert tells us it looks near identical to those from that time. :D

item.title: Cannonball!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

These finds are really interesting. At my old house, after 2 months, we had a WW2 bomb, it was owned by controlled demolition.

Read full topic

[/quote] What did you do with it?[/quote]
Explode it… duuur.

Me and my friends were in my friends (Nick) backyard, and we discovered something that looked like a rock. When we dug it up, it weighed a good 30-40 lbs. I picked it up and examined it, to find it was a cannonball. I think it’s pretty cool. If i can later, i’ll get a picture of it.
